title: for lucy
text:
a small piece of your story,
kept safely here.

you can return to this page
whenever your heart needs it.

title: for mom
text:
thank you for all the quiet things
you did that nobody saw.

today this page belongs to you.

title: our 2025 trip
text:
the days we laughed too loud
and slept too little.

kept here so we never forget
how it felt to be fully alive.
